name: John Doe
title: Full-Stack Developer & AI Enthusiast
description: I am a passionate computer scientist specializing in full-stack web development, mobile app development, data science, and cybersecurity. With a strong foundation in software engineering, I love solving complex problems and building scalable applications.

experiences.description: Developed scalable microservices, optimized database queries, and improved system performance by 30%.
Worked on NLP models and developed a chatbot that improved customer response times by 50%.

projects.title: AI-Powered Chatbot
projects.excerpt: An NLP-based chatbot that automates customer support.
projects.body: Developed an AI chatbot using Python and TensorFlow, reducing customer service response time by 50%.

projects.title: E-Commerce Web App
projects.excerpt: A fully responsive e-commerce platform with a custom CMS.
projects.body: Built a scalable e-commerce application using Next.js and Firebase.

testimonials.name: Jane Smith
testimonials.message: John is an exceptional developer with a strong grasp of modern web technologies. He was instrumental in optimizing our API architecture.
